      • from

        public T from​(java.lang.String json,
              java.lang.Class<? extends org.rootservices.otter.translatable.Translatable> clazz)
       throws InvalidPayloadException,
              DuplicateKeyException,
              UnknownKeyException,
              InvalidValueException
        Translates json from T.
        Parameters:
        json - json to marshal
        clazz - the POJO that is returned.
        Returns:
        an instance of T
        Throws:
        InvalidPayloadException - unpredicted error occurred
        DuplicateKeyException - a key was repeated
        UnknownKeyException - a key was not expected
        InvalidValueException - key value was incorrect for it's type
